comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: What a strange story - enough to make a film of the making of the film. www.imdb.com/title/tt0335306/

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Indeed! I particularly liked this review at Australian Screen, a 'largely forgettable' film. Also, if you're interested, [http://www.flickr.com/photos/nfsa/] have a series of on set images of the cast and crew filming.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
